user.title: E-Redes Smart Metering Plus
user.description:
Your webhook URL is ready. This URL uses a fixed path that won't change:

**{webhook_url}**

Copy this URL and configure it in your E-Redes provider dashboard to receive smart meter data, then click submit to complete the setup.

ðŸ’¡ **Note:** The webhook path `/api/webhook/e_redes_smart_metering_plus` is consistent across restarts.

ðŸ’¡ **Nabu Casa Subscribers:** If you have Home Assistant Cloud, a secure cloud URL is automatically generated using the same fixed webhook ID.

init.title: E-Redes Webhook Configuration
init.description:
This is your webhook URL that should be configured in your E-Redes provider dashboard:

**{webhook_url}**

The webhook uses a fixed path `/api/webhook/e_redes_smart_metering_plus` that remains consistent.

ðŸ’¡ **Nabu Casa Subscribers:** If you have Home Assistant Cloud, a secure cloud URL is automatically generated using the same fixed webhook ID. You can view all your webhooks by going to Settings > Home Assistant Cloud > Webhooks.
